name: gitdoc
description: A continuous, frictionless, background-saving experience that intelligently commits your changes.

gitdoc.autoCommitDelay.markdownDescription: Controls the delay in ms after which any changes are automatically committed. Only applies when `GitDoc: Enabled` is set to `true`.

gitdoc.autoPull.description: Specifies whether to automatically pull changes from the current remote.

gitdoc.autoPullDelay.markdownDescription: Controls the delay in ms after which any commits are automatically pulled. Only applies when `GitDoc: Auto Pull` is set to `afterDelay`.

gitdoc.autoPush.description: Specifies whether to automatically push your changes to the current remote.

gitdoc.autoPushDelay.description: Specifies the number of milliseconds to wait before automatically pushing changes to a remote branch. This setting only applies when 'GitDoc > Auto Push' is set to 'After Delay'.

gitdoc.alwaysShowStatusBarIcon.description: Specifies whether to always show the status bar icon, even when GitDoc is disabled. When true, the icon appearance will change to indicate whether GitDoc is enabled or disabled.

gitdoc.commitMessageFormat.markdownDescription: Specifies the format to use for auto-generated commit messages. This setting only applies when `GitDoc > AI: Enabled` is set to `false`. By default, it uses the [Luxon date format](https://moment.github.io/luxon/#/formatting).

gitdoc.commitValidationLevel.description: Specifies whether to validate that a file is free of problems, before attempting to commit changes to it.

gitdoc.commitOnClose.description: Specifies whether to automatically commit changes when you close VS Code.

gitdoc.enabled.description: Specifies whether to automatically create a commit each time you save a file.

gitdoc.filePattern.description: Specifies a glob that indicates the specific files that should be automatically committed.

gitdoc.noVerify.markdownDescription: Specifies whether to ignore any configured git hooks. Defaults to `false`.

gitdoc.pullOnOpen.description: Specifies whether to automatically pull remote changes when you open a repo.

gitdoc.pushMode.description: Specifies how changes should be pushed after they're committed. This setting only applies when auto-pushing is enabled.

gitdoc.timeZone.markdownDescription: Specifies the timezone (as a [tz database name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones)) that commit message dates should be offset to. Defaults to UTC.

gitdoc.excludeBranches.description: Specifies a list of branches that should be excluded from auto-commits.

gitdoc.ai.enabled.description: Specifies whether to use AI to generate commit messages. This setting only applies when you have the Copilot extension installed and setup.

gitdoc.ai.model.markdownDescription: Specifies the AI model to use when generating commit messages. This setting only applies when `GitDoc > AI: Enabled` is set to `true`. Defaults to `gpt-4o`.

gitdoc.ai.useEmojis.markdownDescription: Specifies whether to prepend AI-generated commit messages with an emoji. This setting only applies when `GitDoc > AI: Enabled` is set to `true`. Defaults to `false`.

gitdoc.ai.customInstructions.markdownDescription: Specifies custom instructions to use when generating commit messages (e.g. use conventional commit syntax, use emojis). This setting only applies when `GitDoc > AI: Enabled` is set to `true`.
